mapper.insert: insert into request_tbl values( req_seq.nextval, #{memberNo}, #{reqTitle}, #{reqCategory}, #{reqTag}, #{reqNick}, #{reqContent}, 0, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD'), 0, 0 )

select count(*) from request_tbl
where req_category = #{selReq}

select req_no as reqNo, member_no as memberNo, req_category as reqCategory, req_title as reqTitle, req_nickname as reqNick, req_date as reqDate, req_content as reqContent, req_tag as reqTag, req_accept as reqAccept, req_rfr as reqRfr, req_accept as reqAccept, member_picturepath as memberPicturepath, req_ask as reqAsk from request_tbl join member_tbl using(member_no) where req_no=#{reqNo}
select reqask_no as reqaskNo, req_no as reqNo, expert_no as expertNo from reqask_tbl where req_no = #{value}

select req_no as reqNo, reqask_no as reqaskNo, expert_no as expertNo, expert_name as expertName, expert_category as expertCategory, member_picturepath as memberPicturepath from reqask_tbl join expert_tbl using(expert_no) join member_tbl using(member_no) where req_no= #{reqNo}
mapper.update: update reqask_tbl set select_expert = 1 where req_no = #{value}
mapper.delete: delete from reqask_tbl where req_no = #{reqNo} and expert_no != #{expertNo }
mapper.select: select select_Expert as selectExpert from reqask_tbl where req_no = #{value}
